resources.string: By downloading and using the MobileCopy app, these terms will automatically apply to you. Please make sure therefore that you read them carefully before using the app. Please be aware that you cannot send it on to anyone else, and you\'re not allowed to copy, or modify the app, any part of the app, or our trademarks, in any way. You\'re not allowed to attempt to extract the source code of the app, you also shouldn\'t try to translate the app or make derivative versions. The app itself, and all the trademarks, copyright, database rights and intellectual property rights related to it, still belong to MobileCopy.
This app was created by MobileCopy
MobileCopy quickly and easily allows you to transfer the data between devices.
MobileCopy session has been cancelled. Please restart this session to transfer all your data from Source to Destination device.
1.Forget the Store Wi-Fi network on this device. \n\n2.Uninstall the MobileCopy app from this device.

1.Forget the Store Wi-Fi network on this device. 

2.Uninstall the MobileCopy app from this device. 

3.Remember to factory reset the Source device if needed.

Allow MobileCopy to access device settings.
(Wallpaper, Screen timeout, Brightness, Volume)

MobileCopy lets you transfer data from your old device to a new device. During use, this app needs the following permissions to provide data transfer services.

Contacts
Used to transfer contacts

Calendar
Used to transfer calendar data

Storage
Used to transfer images, media and files

Camera
Used for reading QR Code

Location
Used for obtaining deviceâ€™s location

Device information such as UUID, device model, system language, OS Version, screen resolution, and ROM version are also collected.

You can exit this app to stop the information collected and upload activities described above.

By tapping I AGREE, you acknowledge and agree to the above content and indicate that you have read the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Statement.

MOBILECOPY PRIVACY POLICY

pervacioo Inc., creator of MobileCopy, recognizes that your privacy is important and that your personal information must be protected. This privacy policy describes the information that we collect from you, how we use it and what we do to protect it.

Please read through this policy carefully and periodically. Please contact us at support@pervacioo.com if you have any questions about the contents of this policy.

The information we collect is necessary for providing our services.

We do not collect any information from or about you that does not have to do with the services provided by our application. Any information that we collect from you is stored as only being connected to your account unless it is otherwise noted on the application. We take your privacy seriously and will only use and disclose information if they align with the terms outlined below.

We do not collect personal information.

Under no circumstances do we collect and store personal information from or about you. Personal information is any information that identifies you or another person, such as your first and last name, physical addresses, email addresses, telephone numbers, fax numbers, or any information that is specific to you that is stored within your device. Our data transfer feature only stores data from your old device onto the new device that you are transferring the information over to. Throughout the entire process, the MobileCopy server is not accessed so that we do not see your personal information. In other words, you can be assured that there is no way for us to collect your information if you use our application to copy the data from one phone to another.

We only collect non-personal information.

In order to ensure that your experience while using our applications is comfortable, we collect non-personal information to better understand user behavior, discover problems with the applications, and improve our products. Non-personal information is data that does not permit direct association with any specific individual. Examples of non-personal information are: device ID, phone IMEI number, phone model, rom, phone operator, location, operation system, transfer logs, etc.

Permissions required by our applications all have a valid reason.

Our application requests for some access permissions that are deemed as access to sensitive and dangerous data on Android devices. You can find detailed explanations for why we request each permission in the Appendix section of this policy.

The permissions requested for our applications are:

Take pictures and videos (CAMERA)

Read your contacts (READ_CONTACTS)

Modify your contacts (WRITE_CONTACTS)

Read calendar (READ_CALENDAR)

Write calendar (WRITE_CALENDAR)

Read the contents of your storage (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE)

Modify or delete the contents of your storage (WRITE_ EXTERNAL_STORAGE)

Security is important to us.

MobileCopy is very concerned about safeguarding the confidentiality of your information. As stated before, we do not collect personal information. In order to protect the non-personal information, we collect from unauthorized access and use, we employ administrative, physical and electronic measures. MobileCopy is well-equipped to handle personal or sensitive user data securely, including transmitting the data to backend server using modern cryptography over HTTPS.

Please be aware that the security measures that we take to protect your information are not absolutely guaranteed to counter unauthorized access or use of your Non-Personal Information.

Children

We do not provide service focus on Children. If you are under 13, please ask permission from your parent or guardian before using our application. Parental supervision is advised.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or comments about this Policy or our privacy practices, or to report any violations of the Policy or abuse of the Services or the Site, please contact us at support@pervacioo.com

We will update this privacy policy to ensure your rights.

To be ensure the quality of your experience and your security, we will be updating our privacy policy as needed. Any changes made to this policy will not reduce your rights in anyway. If the changes to this policy are significant, a notification will be shown on the application. However, smaller changes may be made so please review this policy periodically. If you do not agree to any changes to this policy, you should immediately stop using any of the services we provide and contact us. Your continued use of our services after changes to this Policy have been made mean that you have accepted the terms of the revised Policy. Please note that none of our employees or agents has the authority to violate any of the rights that have been laid out in this policy.

Appendix

Privacy-relevant Android permissions requested by our application CAMERA

Used for permissions that are associated with accessing camera or capturing images and/or videos from the device.

This permission allows this application to support the following feature related to phone camera:

1) Scan QR Code for establishing a wireless connection between two devices faster because this method can bypass the manual input of wireless password.

READ_CONTACTS

Used for permissions that allow an application to read the userâ€™s contacts data. This permission allows the application to transfer telephone contacts as part of the Contacts transfer feature. The purpose is to retrieve the userâ€™s contacts (e.g. phone number, contact name, email, etc) from an old phone and transfer over to and save on a new phone.

WRITE_CONTACTS

Used for permissions that allow an application to write the userâ€™s contacts data. This permission allows the application to transfer telephone contacts as part of the Contacts transfer feature. The purpose is to write userâ€™s contacts (e.g. phone number, contact name, email, etc), that are received from an old phone to the designated contacts storage on a new phone.

READ_CALENDARS

Used for permissions that allow an application to read the user\'s calendar. This permission allows the application to transfer calendar as part of the calendar transfer feature. The purpose is to retrieve userâ€™s calendar from an old phone and transfer over to and save on a new phone.

WRITE_CALENDARS

Used for permissions that allow an application to write (but not read) the user\'s calendar data. This permission allows the application to transfer telephone call log as part of the calendar transfer feature. The purpose is to write userâ€™s calendar, that is retrieved from an old phone, to the designated calendar storage on a new phone.

READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE

Used for permissions that allow an application to read from external storage. This permission allows the application to access any files on the external storage, e.g. SD card, as part of MobileCopy\'s core feature of transferring files. The user can select files to be transferred and send over the wireless connection created by the application.

WRITE _EXTERNAL_STORAGE

Used for permissions that allow an application to write to external storage. This permission allows the application to access the external storage, e.g. SD card, as part of MobileCopyâ€™s core feature of transferring files. The user can choose to save received files that are transferred over the wireless connection into internal storage or external storage. The user must select to save to external storage from in-app settings.
